body_html:
I hit this out of heap space error before as well, this prones to happen when you don't have enough RAM.

A workaround is to remove all /MPcompile flag to make cl.exe create less processes and hence use less memory (works for me).

  • https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/search?l=CMake&q=%2FMP&type=&utf8=%E2%9C%93
  • https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/bb385193.aspx
body_text:
I hit this out of heap space error before as well, this prones to happen when you don't have enough RAM.
A workaround is to remove all /MPcompile flag to make cl.exe create less processes and hence use less memory (works for me).

https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/search?l=CMake&q=%2FMP&type=&utf8=%E2%9C%93
https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/bb385193.aspx
body:
I hit this out of heap space error before as well, this prones to happen when you don't have enough RAM.

A workaround is to remove all `/MP`compile flag to make `cl.exe` create less processes and hence use less memory (works for me).

- https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/search?l=CMake&q=%2FMP&type=&utf8=%E2%9C%93
- https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/bb385193.aspx
